_description: Characteristics of the virtuous, in a Latin sermon de ascensione domini — four monorhyming lines

CULIi38.Transcription:
Myth mylde & strongSyth schort & longRyth wyt outen
                    wrongAnd pes wyt owten throng
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 113.
